tool.name: OpenNLP Sentence Splitter
tool.help:
**What it does**
Detects the sentences in a text using Regular Expressions and a set of simple rules, using the `OpenNLP <https://opennlp.apache.org>`_ sentence splitter (see the `OpenNLP -- Sentence Detection Tutorial <https://www.tutorialspoint.com/opennlp/opennlp_sentence_detection.htm>`_ for more information).
**Required annotations**
* None
.. class:: infomark
This sentence splitter processes plain text in a LIF container. It can also process a LIF document containing `Token <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token.html>`_ annotations.
**Generated annotations**
* A new view containing `Sentence <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Sentence.html>`_ annotations. (LIF)
